thread.title: Apple Board Adds Ex-Boeing Official to Boost Industrial Chops
thread.title_full: Apple Board Adds Ex-Boeing Official to Boost Industrial Chops - Bloomberg Business

author: Bloomberg.com
title: Apple Board Adds Ex-Boeing Official to Boost Industrial Chops
text:
Apple Inc.’s board is elevating its industrial chops by adding former Boeing Co. executive James Bell.
Bell held posts as chief financial officer and corporate president at Boeing, the world’s biggest airplane maker. His career at the manufacturer spanned 38 years and included a stint as interim chief executive officer.
“James brings a wealth of global, financial and industrial experience from his successful career at Boeing,” Apple CEO Tim Cook said in a statement Thursday.
Google Inc., a major Apple competitor, burnished its board expertise in transportation last year when it appointed Alan Mulally, a former CEO of Ford Motor Co. and senior Boeing executive.
